title: Why He Hated God but now Loves Islam and Jesus
description:
Why He Hated God but now Loves Islam and Jesus
Language: English
Reviewing: Osama Emara
Publisher: Website of the Deenshow: http://www.thedeenshow.com
Short Discription: In this episode, Br. Shadid Muhammad shows how he embraced Islam and how he hated God and used to curse God when facing difficulties. He shows that he already believed in God, disbelieved trinity and refused to go to Church. Afterwards he shows the reasons behind embracing Islam, the nature that Allah created people.
Addition Date: 2013-08-05
Short Link: http://IslamHouse.com/438285
